meanings.definition: Make (something) smaller than the usual size.
meanings.sent1: I will miniaturize this toy car to fit in my pocket.
meanings.sent2: Scientists miniaturize electronic devices to make them more portable.
meanings.sent3: Trying to miniaturize a giant cake into a cupcake would be a fun challenge.
meanings.sent4: The artist's goal was to miniaturize the entire city into a tiny model.
meanings.sent5: She used a special machine to miniaturize the furniture for the dollhouse.
